itunes:title: Human Events Sunday Special: Senator Rand Paul
title: Human Events Sunday Special: Senator Rand Paul
description: SUNDAY SPECIAL: Jack Posobiec is joined by Kentucky Senator Rand Paul to discuss the senator’s recent debate with Doctor Fauci. Rand Paul and Jack Posobiec talk about the need for a special council of scientists and experts with medical credentials to examine the decisions of government health officials. Rand Paul breaks down why gain of function research is no longer necessary due to the new MRNA technology. After Rand Paul drops stunning numbers regarding doctors and royalties, Poso gets his opinion regarding the possible criminal indictment that Donald Trump faces and engages in an educational discussion about ‘secret courts’.

itunes:author: Turning Point USA
